item.title: My Hero Academia All’s Justice announced for PS5, Xbox Series XS, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Bandai Namco has kicked off its Summer Showcase by revealing My Hero Academia All’s Justice, which is being developed alongside the final series of the anime and focuses in the final battle. All students of Class 1A will be available to play as in the game too.

The gameplay of My Hero Academia All’s Justice will feature 3v3 fights in arena battles, allowing you to combine the various characters in team. There will also be a Rising system as part of the battle system, and it will allow for various power ups to use in fights.

The release date for My Hero Academia All’s Justice is yet to be confirmed, but the game will be coming to PS5, Xbox Series XS, and PC.

Source: Bandai Namco
